hydrogen:build.description: Builds a Hydrogen storefront for production.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

bundle-stats.name: bundle-stats
bundle-stats.description: Show a bundle size summary after building.

lockfile-check.name: lockfile-check
lockfile-check.description: Checks that there is exactly 1 valid lockfile in the project.

disable-route-warning.name: disable-route-warning
disable-route-warning.description: Disable warning about missing standard routes.

codegen.name: codegen
codegen.description: Generate types for the Storefront API queries found in your project.

codegen-config-path.name: codegen-config-path
codegen-config-path.description: Specify a path to a codegen configuration file. Defaults to `<root>/codegen.ts` if it exists.

diff.name: diff
diff.description: Applies the current files on top of Hydrogen's starter template in a temporary directory.

hydrogen:check.description: Returns diagnostic information about a Hydrogen storefront.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

resource.name: resource
resource.description: The resource to check. Currently only 'routes' is supported.

hydrogen:codegen.description: Generate types for the Storefront API queries found in your project.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

codegen-config-path.name: codegen-config-path
codegen-config-path.description: Specify a path to a codegen configuration file. Defaults to `<root>/codegen.ts` if it exists.

force-sfapi-version.name: force-sfapi-version
force-sfapi-version.description: Force generating Storefront API types for a specific version instead of using the one provided in Hydrogen. A token can also be provided with this format: `<version>:<token>`.

watch.name: watch
watch.description: Watch the project for changes to update types on file save.

env-branch.name: env-branch
env-branch.description: Environment branch (tag) for environment to deploy to.

force.name: force
force.description: Forces a deployment to proceed if there are uncommited changes in its Git repository.

auth-bypass-token.name: auth-bypass-token
auth-bypass-token.description: Generate an authentication bypass token, which can be used to perform end-to-end tests against the deployment.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

shop.name: shop
shop.description: Shop URL. It can be the shop prefix (janes-apparel) or the full myshopify.com URL (janes-apparel.myshopify.com, https://janes-apparel.myshopify.com).

public-deployment.name: public-deployment
public-deployment.description: Marks a preview deployment as publicly accessible.

no-json-output.name: no-json-output
no-json-output.description: Prevents the command from creating a JSON file containing the deployment URL (in CI environments).

metadata-description.name: metadata-description
metadata-description.description: Description of the changes in the deployment. Defaults to the commit message of the latest commit if there are no uncommited changes.

metadata-url.name: metadata-url
metadata-url.description: URL that links to the deployment. Will be saved and displayed in the Shopify admin

metadata-user.name: metadata-user
metadata-user.description: User that initiated the deployment. Will be saved and displayed in the Shopify admin

metadata-version.name: metadata-version
metadata-version.description: A version identifier for the deployment. Will be saved and displayed in the Shopify admin

hydrogen:dev.description: Runs Hydrogen storefront in an Oxygen worker for development.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

port.name: port
port.description: Port to run the server on.

worker.name: worker
worker.description: Run the app in a worker environment closer to Oxygen production instead of a Node.js sandbox.

codegen.name: codegen
codegen.description: Generate types for the Storefront API queries found in your project. It updates the types on file save.

codegen-config-path.name: codegen-config-path
codegen-config-path.description: Specify a path to a codegen configuration file. Defaults to `<root>/codegen.ts` if it exists.

disable-virtual-routes.name: disable-virtual-routes
disable-virtual-routes.description: Disable rendering fallback routes when a route file doesn't exist.

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Enables inspector connections with a debugger.

inspector-port.name: inspector-port
inspector-port.description: Port where the inspector will be available.

env-branch.name: env-branch
env-branch.description: Specify an environment's branch name when using remote environment variables.

disable-version-check.name: disable-version-check
disable-version-check.description: Skip the version check when running `hydrogen dev`

diff.name: diff
diff.description: Applies the current files on top of Hydrogen's starter template in a temporary directory.

hydrogen:g.description: Shortcut for `hydrogen generate`. See `hydrogen generate --help` for more information.

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the new Hydrogen storefront.

language.name: language
language.description: Sets the template language to use. One of `js` or `ts`.

template.name: template
template.description: Scaffolds project based on an existing template or example from the Hydrogen repository.

install-deps.name: install-deps
install-deps.description: Auto install dependencies using the active package manager

mock-shop.name: mock-shop
mock-shop.description: Use mock.shop as the data source for the storefront.

styling.name: styling
styling.description: Sets the styling strategy to use. One of `tailwind`, `css-modules`, `vanilla-extract`, `postcss`, `none`.

markets.name: markets
markets.description: Sets the URL structure to support multiple markets. One of `subfolders`, `domains`, `subdomains`, `none`.

shortcut.name: shortcut
shortcut.description: Create a shortcut to the Shopify Hydrogen CLI.

git.name: git
git.description: Init Git and create initial commits.

hydrogen:link.description: Link a local project to one of your shop's Hydrogen storefronts.

force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

storefront.name: storefront
storefront.description: The name of a Hydrogen Storefront (e.g. "Jane's Apparel")

hydrogen:shortcut.description: Creates a global `h2` shortcut for the Hydrogen CLI

hydrogen:unlink.description: Unlink a local project from a Hydrogen storefront.

path.name: path

hydrogen:upgrade.description: Upgrade Remix and Hydrogen npm dependencies.

path.name: path

version.name: version
version.description: A target hydrogen version to update to

force.name: force
force.description: Ignore warnings and force the upgrade to the target version

hydrogen:debug:cpu.description: Builds and profiles the server startup time the app.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

output.name: output
output.description: Specify a path to generate the profile file. Defaults to "startup.cpuprofile".

hydrogen:env:list.description: List the environments on your linked Hydrogen storefront.

path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

adapter.name: adapter
adapter.description: Remix adapter used in the route. The default is `@shopify/remix-oxygen`.

force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

routeName.description: The route to generate. One of home,page,cart,products,collections,policies,blogs,account,search,robots,sitemap,all.

hydrogen:generate:routes.description: Generates all supported standard shopify routes.

adapter.name: adapter
adapter.description: Remix adapter used in the route. The default is `@shopify/remix-oxygen`.

force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

hydrogen:setup:markets.description: Setup support for multiple markets in your project.
